projects.title: SoftTerest - Angular2
projects.description: SoftTerest is a platform for sharing ideas. You can create,edit,delete (CRUD) ideas with others or like/comment people's ideas.

projects.title: DonUni - VueJS
projects.description: DonUni is a donor search platform for your causes. You can create,edit,delete (CRUD) your causes and people out there (registered users) can donate to your causes, of course, and you to their causes.
